get.summary: Credentials queries the credentials of a service.

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: address is the address of the credentials to query.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: identifier is the owner of the credentials to query.

parameters.name: params_type
parameters.description:
type is the type of the credentials to query.

 - PARAMS_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: PARAMS_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED is the default parameter type
 - PARAMS_TYPE_ATTESTATION: PARAMS_TYPE_ATTESTATION is for the attestation params
 - PARAMS_TYPE_ASSERTION: PARAMS_TYPE_ASSERTION is for the assertion params

sonrhq.sonr.service.v1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters of the module.

sonrhq.sonr.service.v1.ParamsType.description:
- PARAMS_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: PARAMS_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED is the default parameter type
 - PARAMS_TYPE_ATTESTATION: PARAMS_TYPE_ATTESTATION is for the attestation params
 - PARAMS_TYPE_ASSERTION: PARAMS_TYPE_ASSERTION is for the assertion params
sonrhq.sonr.service.v1.ParamsType.title: ParamsType defines the type of params

attestation_options.description: attestation_options is the attestation options of the credentials.

assertion_options.description: assertion_options is the assertion options of the credentials.

origin.description: origin is the service record of the origin of the credentials.

sonrhq.sonr.service.v1.QueryCredentialsR.description: QueryCredentialsResponse is the response type for the Query/Credentials RPC method.

params.description: params defines the parameters of the module.

sonrhq.sonr.service.v1.QueryParamsRespon.description: QueryParamsResponse is the response type for the Query/Params RPC method.
